Posts.EditableText:
I love  this tool on windows and online  ,
How do you upload an aslx file saved by quest to the online version to resume editing it? 
And how you delete a published quest file? 

Thanks in advance
Posts.HTML:
I love this tool on windows and online ,
How do you upload an aslx file saved by quest to the online version to resume editing it?
And how you delete a published quest file?

Thanks in advance

Posts.EditableText:
1.  I’m not sure you can and even if you could I would advise against it.  The download version is far better than the online version.  Use the downloaded version of at all possible.

2.  I think you can publish the game again and change it to private.  This is essentially deleting it from public view.
Posts.HTML:
1. I’m not sure you can and even if you could I would advise against it. The download version is far better than the online version. Use the downloaded version of at all possible.

  2. I think you can publish the game again and change it to private. This is essentially deleting it from public view.
